awd_titl_txt: Engineering Research Equipment Grant:  High Temperature     Tribometer
awd_abstract_narration: This award funds acquisition of a high-temperature test cell for                friction and wear tests.  The equipment allows accurate control of              the various test conditions - temperature, environment, load and                sliding velocity; and it allows accurate measurement of friction                forces and wear.  It will support on-going and planned research on              elevated temperature tribological behavior and surface reactions of             ceramic materials and on performance and deterioration of high                  temperature solid lubricants. These are areas of currently intense              research interest.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE TRUSTEES OF THE STEVENS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY
